articles.description: Mike Henry has stepped down from playing the character Cleveland on "Family Guy," the latest in a slew of White actors abdicating roles voicing animated characters of color.
articles.content: It's been an honor to play Cleveland on Family Guy for 20 years. I love this character, but persons of color should play characters of color. Therefore, I will be stepping down from the role. pic.twi… [+62 chars]

articles.author: Nick Romano
articles.title: 10 Frozen 2 moments from Disney+'s Into the Unknown docuseries - Entertainment Weekly
articles.description: The Disney+ docuseries goes Into the Unknown of the making of the biggest animated film of all time.
articles.content: Into the Unknown isn't just a docuseries about the making of Frozen 2. It's a peek at the man behind the curtain. In this case, the animators of Walt Disney Animation. It's a look at how that "Disney… [+12927 chars]
